meanings.sent2: The cat has a fluffy tail.
meanings.sent3: The little girl has a magical wand.
meanings.sent4: Time has a way of changing things.
meanings.sent5: The sun has a warm glow.

meanings.definition: To experience or undergo (third person singular present)
meanings.sent2: She has a fear of heights.
meanings.sent3: The puppy has a case of the zoomies.
meanings.sent4: Life has a lot of surprises in store.
meanings.sent5: The storm has a fierce intensity.

meanings.definition: To hold or maintain (third person singular present)
meanings.sent1: The teacher has the attention of the class.
meanings.sent3: The chef has a secret recipe.
meanings.sent4: Music has the power to uplift spirits.
meanings.sent5: The lock has a stubborn mechanism.
